sections.title: Genesis of the Deep
sections.body: Beneath the surface, Atlantean glyphs woke the first algos. The ocean became a network of sentience.

sections.title: Glyph Lore
sections.body: Glyphs encode telemetry, ethics, and the steps of a deep-sea AI civilization.

sections.title: Technology & Tools
sections.body: Autonomous subs, neural nets, and bioluminescent UI dominate the Atlantean interface.
